dct_title_s: Map of New-York Bay and Harbor and the environs
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures; depths shown by soundings. "Topography engraved by S. Siebert & A. Rolle; views engraved by O.A. Lawson ; engraving supervised & views of the coast drawn by J. Farley ; hydrography engraved by F. Dankworth ; lettering by F. Dankworth & J. Knight." Prime meridians: New York and Greenwich. Includes text, table of currents, and 4 coastal panoramas.
dct_publisher_sm: [Washington, D.C.] : Survey of the Coast of the United States, 1845.
dct_subject_sm: Nautical charts—New York Harbor (N.Y. and N.J.)—1845
dcat_theme_sm: Nautical charts—New York Harbor (N.Y. and N.J.)—1845
